      • noOverwriteIfFileDidNotChange

        public void noOverwriteIfFileDidNotChange()
                                   throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException,
                                          org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Checks if the DDL are only overwritten if their content has changed.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if anything wents wrong when executing the Mojo.
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - if anything wents wrong when executing the Mojo.
        InterruptedException - If the test thread could not be interrupted.

      • overwriteFileIfContentChanges

        public void overwriteFileIfContentChanges()
                                   throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException,
                                          org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException,
                                          InterruptedException,
                                          IOException
        Checks if the DDL files are overwritten when the schema changes.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if anything wents wrong when executing the Mojo.
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - if anything wents wrong when executing the Mojo.
        InterruptedException - If the test thread could not be interrupted.
        IOException - if the access to the file system fails
